resources.string: Please assess whether the provided image depicts human teeth. Evaluate image clarity, presence of teeth, signs of decay or cavities, and overall relevance to dental assessment. Estimate the likelihood of it being a teeth image on a scale from 0 to 10. If the image does not meet criteria or does not depict human teeth, explain what it portrays, why and provide a detailed explanation and guide the user on how to upload a suitable image for dental analysis.
